## HandleInstanceType type

Extracts the instance type associated with a [Handle](./core.handle.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type HandleInstanceType<H extends Handle> = H extends Handle<infer I> ? I : never;
```
